data.text: A new apprenticeship levy on big companies will deliver 3 million more apprenticeships this parliament
We will take the family home out of Inheritance tax. Promise made. Promise delivered
Am creating new Roads Fund. From 2020 every penny raised in VED in England will be invested in our strategic road network
Productivity Plan will include transport, infrastructure, planning, housing & skills – more to come Friday.
I am today abolishing permanent non-dom status. British people should pay British taxes
To ensure we have public services we can afford & keep more jobs, we will continue public sector pay awards at 1% rise a yr for next 4yrs
We will support the vulnerable and ensure those with the broadest shoulders are bearing the greatest burden
The @OBR forecast national debt falling in every future year. We’ve left age of irresponsibility behind & will fix roof while sun is shining
We will cut the deficit at the same pace as in the last parliament - surplus now in 19/20, national debt lower, surplus higher
This is a big budget for a country with big ambitions. It is a One Nation budget that delivers for the whole United Kingdom
Britain is fundamentally stronger than 5 years ago. But greatest mistake would be to think all our problems are solved.
The #SummerBudget today puts security first: economic security, financial security and our national security
Today I will present a Conservative Budget - a Budget that puts economic security first http://t.co/yQ8kD8nmo9
About to do interview on @marrshow talking about my Budget which will deliver economic security for working people
Good luck to all involved in today's @KnutsfordProms, Knutsford's incredible free arts & heritage street theatre festival.
Try to visit the @KnutsfordProms street theatre festival tomorrow in Cheshire. I know from previous years it's a great day out
Fantastic that we continue to get taxpayers’ money back through Lloyds share sales, taking total now to over £12.5bn
Great news today – consumer confidence at 15yr high & GDP revised up - cementing UK as fastest growing G7 economy
Fantastic that we continue to get taxpayers’ money back through Lloyds share sales, taking total now to over £12bn
On Greek crisis, while we hope for the best, we now need to be prepared for the worst.
In Luxembourg for ECOFIN. Into the eleventh hour of the Greek crisis, and we urge the Greek government to agree a deal before it is too late
Latest stats show over 100,000 people have been able to buy a home with @HelptoBuy. Government backing working people
60k people already accessed #PensionFreedoms - to ensure working people always get best deal we’ll look at introducing cap on exit fees
Over the last year UK employment rate has increased faster than any other G7 country, a step closer to achieving goal of full employment
Stats show 400,000 more people in work compared to a year ago, that's over 1k extra working people per day - vast majority full time jobs
Latest stats show pay packets grew at 2.7% in April - fastest real increase since start of crisis. Good news for working people
Good news today for working people – inflation close to its all time low while wages growing strongly – further proof long term plan working
Key demand: EU stops costly &damaging regulation &rediscovers economic ambitions that once made this most dynamic & prosperous part of world
We need new settlement with partners in Europe – in essence we want to secure a Britain that is in Europe but not run by Europe
Taken all together, I’m confident selling our stakes in banks will get more back for taxpayers than they were forced to put in
Now is the time for @RBSgroup to rebuild as a commercial bank that no longer relies on the state but serves Britain’s working people
We’ll begin selling our stake in @RBSgroup in coming months – right thing for @RBSgroup, small businesses, economy & crucially the taxpayer
Have decided now is right time to begin selling our @RBSgroup stake. Governor of @bankofengland confirms this is in the public interest
The @RoyalMail share price has risen so we're going to give more of the shares to the staff
We're going to make sure there's a special bonus for the @RoyalMail workforce who've done such a great job turning Royal Mail around.
Announcing we have begun to sell remaining @RoyalMail shares tonight – it will help them invest & serve customers better
Great to announce that we have raised another £500m for the taxpayer through Lloyds share sales, taking total to over £11bn
On Fair & Effective Market Review findings –we’ll act now to ensure those who commit financial crime will be treated like criminals they are
On #FinancialServices I want UK to be best regulated in world, have more competition & innovation, and be best place for global bank HQs
We act now to fix the roof when sun is shining. I’ll introduce new fiscal framework with permanent commitment to run surplus in normal times
We seek new settlement for British economy; in the way we manage public finances & in what we ask of financial services & partners in Europe
At #MansionHouse setting out plan to move Britain from crisis & recovery, towards a new settlement of responsibility & prosperity
We were elected as party for working people & will govern as party for working people. We back aspiration & prioritise economic security
We’ll begin selling remaining 30% stake in @RoyalMail - right thing for @RoyalMail, biz & families who depend on it & crucially the taxpayer
.@GregHands asked depts to find more savings – they have done this & alongside asset sales we’ll save extra £4.5bn
When it comes to living within our means, the sooner we start the smoother the ride. So today we are getting on with what we promised
Been speaking in the #QueensSpeech #Economy debate – outlining next stages in long term plan to secure future for working people
.@OECD confirm UK is ahead with fastest growth in G7 in 2014 &2015 – best way to support working people is a plan to fix & grow the economy
And today’s @HelptoBuy figures also show that 80% of those it’s helped have been #FirstTimeBuyers http://t.co/b9sImcQCaJ
Great news –@HelptoBuy has helped nearly 100,000 working people achieve aim of home ownership http://t.co/KgjxJaWFI7
Announcing major expansion to #Birmingham #EnterpriseZone to attract more investment here in the Midlands
Great to see new construction work going on @innobham to build new tech incubator iCentrum in #Birmingham http://t.co/hfbp3WxqxS
Have been meeting with elected leaders here in #WestMidlands - discussing how we can hand power back to local people
Great to meet staff @Garrandale in #Derby talking about how we'll deliver for whole of the #Midlands http://t.co/RoFHRwreBf
Backing great engineering firms like @Garrandale who are exporting & creating jobs is key to making #Midlands Britain's #EngineforGrowth
Our plan to back key strengths in manufacturing, science & energy will make the #Midlands Britain's engine for growth http://t.co/jaa9vg8wSI
Am in the #Midlands with a clear message: This One Nation govt will back working people at every stage of life
Our trading plan has been hugely successful, helping get back over half the money taxpayers put into Lloyds. Retail offer promised to follow
I’m extending our Lloyds trading plan for 6 months so we can get more taxpayers’ money back & pay down more of our national debt
Went to see new James Bond movie being filmed at the Treasury today. Great British cast and crew, symbol of thriving British film industry
Hope to work constructively with Tony Lloyd,  G. Manchester's new interim Mayor. Looking forward to 1st election in 2017 #NorthernPowerhouse
Investing in cultural assets of North is key to #NorthernPowerhouse – #TurnerPrize in Hull will play big part in success CityofCulture 2017
Brilliant news that #TurnerPrize will be hosted at@HullsFerens in 2017 – decision follows £1.5m of funding PM and I announced in February
Honoured to speak in Frauenkirche - beautiful baroque cathedral destroyed in fight against fascism,rebuilt with international inc UK support
In Dresden with other #g7finance ministers. Serious challenges facing global economy: we need to tackle them together.
My message to our new MPs is simple: the job is not done & we have a clear task ahead to fix our economy so that it works for working people
Been with our new Conservative MPs in the Downing St garden. Great to see so many brilliant local campaigners elected.
Plan we'll deliver for #SouthWest all about backing biz from Babcock to Cornish Glass create jobs for working people http://t.co/f19yMjrdEj
Great to be here in #StAustell with our strong new MP @stevedouble visiting Cornish Glass, family biz with big plans to grow & create jobs
The #SouthWest gave this Govt a major vote of confidence. We will repay that faith helping working people here at every stage of their lives
With local MP @Geoffrey_Cox and great new  MP @peternorthdevon to discuss how we'll upgrade North Devon Link Road
Brilliant to meet the workforce at Babcock shipyard in Appledore, Devon and talk to them about how we'll deliver for the whole South West.
In #SouthWest just 2 weeks after election with simple message.You've been long neglected by govts in Westminster.I’m here to say:not anymore
So announcing that new Chief Sec @GregHands is today asking govt departments to identify further savings for this financial year.
Achieved underspends in previous yrs; can do so again this year. When saving money, the more we can do early, the smoother the ride
We’ll merge UK Financial Investments & Shareholder Executive to return govt stakes in banks & other assets back to private sector
Our plan to make Britain work better: Rebalancing economy, paying down debts & boosting productivity will be at heart of my summer Budget
Great to be part of @CBItweets dinner celebrating 50yrs as strong voice for business – that voice never been more important. #CBI50
Inspirational @PeteBowker attempting first unassisted crossing by an amputee. We donated £100k of #Libor funds at #Budget2015 to help him.
Just got off the phone to the Ice Team @65degnorth. Great to hear about their brilliant progress crossing the Greenland Ice Cap.
Our 65+ Pensioner Bonds have been a huge success and are helping older savers. Reminder: today is the last day they're available.
Great to meet those rebuilding the tunnel in #Farnworth with our impressive new Treasury Minister Jim O'Neill http://t.co/9nfZngneuB
Visiting works at #Farnworth Tunnel which is being rebuilt thanks to investment in electrification of Bolton line.Means more & better trains
Jim is a world leading economist & as Chair of the City Growth Commission, his work has inspired the thinking behind #NorthernPowerhouse
I am delighted to confirm Jim O’Neill as the new Commercial Secretary @hmtreasury to make devolution and the #NorthernPowerhouse happen
We will not impose a mayor on anyone. But we will only transfer major powers to cities who have a directly elected metro-wide mayor
The Queen’s Speech will include new Cities Devolution Bill which will mean that any city can proceed to implement a Mayoral devolution deal
New law in Queen's speech puts the Power into #NorthernPowerhouse. My door is open to all those who want to join the revolution in city govt
In #Manchester for my 1st speech since election to talk about next steps in building a #NorthernPowerhouse

It started in Manchester but this is a One Nation government & today I
say to all our great cities -my
door is wide open to working with you

This is a revolution in the way we govern England - giving power to
working people with local communities reaping the rewards

Greater Manchester will get its first elected mayor in 2017 as part of
our #NorthernPowerhouse through a bill in the upcoming Queen's Speech

Today I can announce radical devolution to the great cities of England
starting with Greater Manchester - a model for others to follow
Further proof our plan is working @ONS confirm regular pay packets growing at fastest in four years, putting more £s in people’s pockets
More people in work than ever before & full-time employees making up nearly all of the increase in employment over the past year
Employment is bedrock of economic security & today's strong @ONS figures show why we need to finish the job to deliver full employment
Great that we’ve now got back over half of taxpayers’ money put into Lloyds Bank & now own less than 20%  #longtermeconomicplan
At ECOFIN this am to discuss Greek crisis & in margins of meeting start in earnest conversation how we reform Britain's relationship with EU
Huge congratulations to my former PPS @Halfon4HarlowMP who will do a brilliant job as deputy chairman of the party.
Delighted to welcome @greghands and @Harriettbaldin to @HMTreasury. They will be strong members of the team

data.text: Been with @David_Cameron @MarstonsBeer. Their chief exec signed biz letter backing our plan, warning changing course risks recovery
Britain now knows: Vote for Ed Miliband and jobs, investment & economic recovery are at risk. Britain should stick with plan that's working
Warning from Britain's business leaders couldn't be clearer: a change of course will threaten jobs, deter investment & put recovery at risk
Business leaders' message is positive: under David Cameron's leadership, we have an economic plan that is working and creating jobs
Over 100 business leaders, heading up some of most famous brands from Prudential to Primark & employing over 500,000 people, have spoken out
With fantastic local #Hove candidate @Coxgraham @PizzaExpress being taught by apprentices how to make an American Hot http://t.co/oj5LwV8qFS

Consumer confidence at its highest level for over 12 years. #longtermeconomicplan delivering greater economic security to Britain's families
Real household disposable income per capita up strongly on quarter & year, higher than OBR forecast.Living standards higher than in May 2010
GDP revised upwards from 2.6% to 2.8% for 2014. Confirms UK as clearly fastest growing major advanced economy
Hat trick of good news just out from ONS: GDP revised up, consumer confidence up, living standards up. #LongTermEconomicPlan working
We are offering a 7 day-a-week NHS. We can only afford a strong NHS because we have a strong economy
Powerful speech by PM. His message: to the homebuyer, the pensioner, and the family who want economic security - we're with you
Proud to introduce the PM onto stage. He is a patriot, a leader and someone I'm lucky to call my friend

With our brilliant candidate for Wells @JSHeappey. He offers best of both worlds-strong local MP & national #longtermeconomicplan that works

Growth up. Jobs up. Living standards rising. Deficit is down. National debt share falling. Britain is the comeback country #Budget15
New £1000 Personal Savings Allowance abolishes savings tax for 95% taxpayers

Taking 4 major steps on #Savings: extending pension freedom, making ISAs more flexible + new @HelptoBuy ISA & new Personal Savings Allowance
Our tax cuts mean that typical taxpayer will be over £900 a year better off & 3.7m of the lowest paid taken out of tax altogether.
Threshold at which people pay higher rate tax also rises above inflation
#Budget15 raises personal allowance to £10.8k next yr & £11k year after delivering tax cut for 27m
Am cancelling planned increase in #fuelduty - meaning longest duty freeze in 20 yrs and average £10 saving each time a family fills up car
On #duties am cutting beer duty for 3rd year in a row – another penny off a pint & cutting cider duty and Scotch whisky duty by 2% #Budget15
We will also abolish the annual tax return altogether helping 12m people & #smallbiz save time and money
To support 5m who are self-employed we will be abolishing Class 2 NICs for them entirely – making tax simpler for hardworking people

#Budget15 makes TV & film tax credits more generous, expands support for video games and launches new tax credit for orchestras
Falling oil prices good for families but a danger to those whose jobs depend on North Sea- #Budget15 cuts tax for this vital industry
In #Scotland pushing ahead with #devolution, implementing #Glasgow City Deal & opening negotiations on new deals for #Aberdeen & #Inverness
Giving more power to #Wales - reducing toll on Severn Crossing & working on new #Cardiff city deal.

For #London announcing £97m for new station in Brent Cross, £7m for Croydon regeneration & new powers for Mayor over skills & planning
To build #EngineForGrowth in #Midlands we are giving £60m to new Energy Research Accelerator and £100m for driverless technology
For #Yorkshire we have agreed new city deal with West Yorkshire Combined Authority #NorthernPowerhouse
We've reached provisional agreement to allow Greater Manchester to keep100% of additional growth in local business rates #NorthernPowerhouse
To build a #NorthernPowerhouse we are investing in #transport, giving £20m to Health North, and promoting industries from chemicals to tech
Will use #libor funds to pay for new helicopters for Essex & Herts, East Anglian, Welsh & Scottish air ambulances & the Lucy Air ambulance
On #charities I’m extending automatic gift-aid on donations from £5k to £8k helping over 6,500 small charities #Budget15
Today I can announce a further £75 million of new help for charities through #Libor funds as part of #Budget15
As banks recover, they can make bigger contribution to repair public finances so #Budget15 puts up bank levy - raising extra £900m a year
We will reduce Lifetime Allowance from £1.25m to £1m saving £600m, then index it. Fewer than 4% pension savers affected
Lower paid 50% of taxpayers now pay smaller proportion of income tax than at any time under previous government
Compared to 5 years ago: inequality lower, child poverty down, pensioner poverty at lowest level ever & gender pay gap never been smaller
Not finished fixing public finances so   Budget commits to £30bn of further savings from efficiencies, welfare & clamp down on tax avoidance
Deficit more than halved & OBR revise it down to 4% in 15/16; 2% in 16/17, 0.6% in 17/18. UK running surplus for 1st time in 18yrs in 18/19
The OBR confirm today that deficit has more than halved under this govt but more must be done and with our #LongTermEconomicPlan it will be
As national debt share is falling a year earlier than forecast at the autumn statement – squeeze on public spending ends a year earlier too
Debt target set in 2010 said we would get debt falling as percentage of GDP by end of parliament. We've achieved that
No short term giveaway can possibly help people as much as a long term national recovery. #LongTermEcononicPlan
Central judgement of #Budget15 is to use resources from bank sales, lower welfare bills & lower interest payments to pay down national debt

Celebrating @SmallBizSatUk with 100 small businesses at Downing St Christmas Fair http://t.co/dw9aS8NpYn
Delighted to be at British Library to launch new Knowledge Quarter which includes Wellcome Trust, Crick Institute & now new Turing Institute
New Turing Institute will lead Britain’s research into big data – fitting tribute to the father of modern computer science & a national hero
New £42m Alan Turing Institute for Data Science will be in London's new Knowledge Quarter with links to universities across UK
Getting firms to invest + create jobs is key to #LongTermEconomicPlan which is why I announced at #AS2014 further support for R&D
Great to visit @BentleyMotors manufacturing plant who are announcing today a £40m new R&D centre with 300 new jobs here in Crewe
Fantastic to hear that following changes to private placement investments in #AS2014 there will be £9bn of new private investment in the UK
Doing #AS2014 interviews with @GMB, @BBCBreakfast, @BBC5live, @BBCr4today & @SkyNews from Bentley factory in Crewe
House of Commons has passed motion so new reformed stamp duty changes will kick in at midnight. Further debate on this tomorrow #AS2014
Am introducing a fair, lasting reform to housing taxation. 98% of all homes paying stamp duty will be better off under these changes #AS2014
The personal allowance is due to go up to £10,500 in April. Am putting it up to £10,600 - in total now a tax cut of £825 for over 26m people
Am announcing today that when an ISA holder dies, they can pass on their ISA tax free to their spouse #AS2014
Investing in new &modern trains for the North & new £250million Royce centre for advanced material science in Manchester #NorthernPowerhouse
Today am introducing - for the first time - government backed student loans for post graduates #AS2014

On science - we have gone from
14th to 2nd in Global Innovation Index. I want us to be top
Am abolishing economy Air Passenger Duty for children under 12 from this May & for all under 16s from 2016. #AS2014
With Small business Saturday this weekend am increasing our business rates Help for the High Street to £1,500 #AS2014
More help for small biz on business rates, we're increasing R&D tax credit, expanding business bank & extending Funding for Lending
Treasury analysis shows richest 20% of households contributing more to deficit reduction than everyone else put together
Am introducing a 25% tax on profits generated by multinationals from activity here in UK which are being artificially shifted abroad #AS2014
We're taking further steps to control benefits -welfare spending now set to be £1bn lower than forecast & will go on falling as share of GDP
Today am refunding the VAT that hospice charities incur - so like the NHS they will get their VAT back #AS2014
New LIBOR fines will support benevolent charities, the Ghurkhas and £10 million to help veterans with hearing problems #AS2014
The deficit is cut - no longer by a third but by half this year. We need to keep working through plan to reach a surplus in next parliament
Borrowing falling every year -slightly less than expected for 2 yrs then more than expected for 4 yrs. We end in slightly stronger position
85% of new jobs are full time, jobs are growing fastest in Scotland & the North and gender pay gap at lowest level in Britain's history
On average for every day of this government, 1000 new jobs have been created. That's 1000 new opportunities & economic security every day
Growth is balanced with manufacturing growing faster than any other sector; and investment is set to be up 11% this year #AS2014
Over the past year, UK growth has been faster than any other G7 country. Today the economy is forecast to grow by 3% - up from 2.7%
Can announce we'll repay in full our #WW1 debt.In today's #AS2014 I'll set out how we will secure the economy & stay on course to prosperity
Ahead of #AS2014 with Forces Benevolent charities. £2.5m of LIBOR will support welfare of soldiers sailors & airmen http://t.co/9qRryLrpDQ
At Homerton hospital meeting staff with @Jeremy_Hunt & NHS head Simon Stevens to discuss our plan for the NHS http://t.co/JoFSsQQ7KK
Will be on @MarrShow talking about staying the course to prosperity & how a strong economy means we can afford a strong NHS
Engagement event on King Street enhancements Dec 3 4-8pm and Dec 6 10-4 at the Curzon. Feedback from Knutsfordians is vital @KnutsfordNews
But @OECD highlight growing external risk which is why we must continue to work through the plan that's delivering a better economic future
Good news from @OECD - UK expected to grow faster than any other G7 economy. Further evidence #longtermeconomicplan is working
Been speaking at launch of Creative Industries Federation - a sector Britain is brilliant at & which this government will go on supporting
Handforth Paddock Fair is 11-4pm tomorrow. Great local family event shortlisted for Community Impact award @cheshire_books @necbawards

data.text: ONS data shows pay rising 4.1% for those in a job for more than a year, further evidence #longtermeconomicplan working but more to do
Gender pay gap now stands at lowest level since records began, another sign of real progress in the fight for equal pay
At #Masterhitch nr Strood meeting engineering apprentices. 3 days to by-election. 2 horse race. Only 1 strong, local voice in #KellyTolhurst
Just spoke to the remarkable Bob Geldof. Told him we'll waive VAT on #BandAid30 so every penny goes to fight Ebola
At Bourne Way with brilliant @PaulMaynardMP to see road improvements & discuss what more needed on A585
Great to speak to local businesses at thriving firm @victrexplc - we discussed how improvements to A585 could support economy here
Breaking ground on the much-needed A556 Knutsford to Bowdon works in my constituency, funded by this government after 30 year wait
Visiting set of Evermoor @ArleyHall in my constituency. Exciting new show by @DisneyChannelUK & @LimePictures creating new jobs in the area
Switching on superfast broadband for the Plumley & Peover area today thanks to Connecting Cheshire @CheshireEast @SFB_Cheshire
Good meeting re A47 with local MPs  @ChloeSmithMP @KeithSimpsonMP @ben4ipswitch @peter_aldous @Freeman_George  & candidate @Anne4NthNorfolk
We gave the go-ahead for £24.4m improvements to A47 Postwick Junction nr Norwich in May -now the project is a third of the way to completion
At Postwick Junction on A47 nr Norwich to see how our improvements are already cutting traffic congestion & bringing new homes & jobs
Good meeting with great Conservative candidates @MarcusFysh & @DJWarburton who have made sure PM and I know A303 is a priority
Wincanton believe improvements to the A303 will help them grow + create jobs - it’ll be more reliable for businesses & safer for drivers
Travelling on A303 to Wincanton logistics depot near Yeovil & hearing about firm's experiences with delays on  A303 http://t.co/Ify6LsbPrJ
At Autumn Statement I’ll announce 1st 5 year road plan. So I’m visiting some of nation’s most congested routes to see what needs to be done
Improving roads is key part of our plan to raise productivity. By saving money elsewhere we can afford biggest road improvements since 1970s
More jobs, fewer unemployed & pay cheques rising. If we want to keep Britain on this path, we need to work through our #LongTermEcononicPlan
Today's stats show record number of jobs &big fall in unemployment.Encouraging signs that pay cheques starting to rise faster than inflation
Today shows why we're right to create a powerful new financial regulator & set up with Bank of England the Fair & Effective Markets Review
A number of traders have been suspended or fired&Serious Fraud Office conducting criminal investigations.Banks employing them face big fines
We're taking tough action to clean up corruption by a few so we have a financial system that works for everyone. #LongTermEconomicPlan
New #paydayloan cap will be in place in New Year – part of our #longtermeconomicplan to have banking system on side of #hardworkingpeople
We set up @TheFCA & asked them to regulate payday lenders. Today they announce a cap on the cost of #paydayloans
On @agendaitv this evening with @VictoriaCoren, @AnthonyHorowitz and the brilliant entrepreneur @MichelleMone
Getting young people into work is key to #LongTermEconomicPlan so great to see @AldiUK commitment to employ up to 1000 apprentices a year
Fantastic news that thriving @AldiUK  plans to create an impressive 35,000 new jobs by 2022.
Let's create a sovereign wealth fund for North, so shale gas receipts used for long term investment & jobs #NorthernPowerhouse
All D-Day veterans will now be able to travel to Normandy where they bravely fought from next year, funded by #LIBOR fines #LestWeForget
I've had intensive & constructive discussions with other countries & Commission.EU rules will be changed forever so this never happens again
We'll get full British rebate - paid upfront. We will pay c£850m total, in instalments in 2nd half of next year.

data.text: We are supporting businesses across the UK to invest by doubling the Annual Investment Allowance to £500,000 #Budget2014
We’re committing £20m for repairs to our Cathedrals -vital we protect these symbols of our shared history for local communities & visitors
We’re going to extend Help to Buy, support house building in Barking Riverside, build a new Garden City & work to regenerate Brent Cross
Great that @onedirection supporting action on global poverty.Proud to confirm in Budget UK committed to spend 0.7% of national income on aid
We've taken more difficult decisions on public sector pay and pensions. Biggest risk to recovery would be abandoning plan that's working
Faced with a recovering economy & improved borrowing figures, many Chancellors would be tempted to squander the gains. I have not done that
We inherited the largest deficit since WWII but have already cut it by a third. The OBR forecast says it will have halved this coming year
1.7million new private sector jobs created since the start of 2010 and more people in work than ever before #Budget2014
Our long term plan is working: the economy grew 3 times faster in 2013 than expected at last budget. We're building a resilient economy
Today I will deliver a Budget for a resilient economy - starting with a resilient pound coin http://t.co/Ev2IuNpXg4
Government will provide 20% support on childcare costs for up to £10k per child #TaxFreeChildcare
Today we are setting out how #TaxFreeChildcare will work. New scheme will be simple & flexible - find out more here  https://t.co/aZh2PUOfkO
Delighted to confirm Nemat Shafik and Ben Broadbent as Deputy Governors at the Bank of England. A strong team
Higgins' proposals mean North gets #HS2 hub 6 years sooner creating more growth & helping rebalance the economy
David Higgins' report today on #HS2 confirms huge potential to rebalance economy
We're going to invest £200m to support 15,000 new homes and create the first Garden City for almost 100 years in Ebbsfleet Kent
I'm extending #HelptoBuy Equity Loan til the end of the decade - means 120,000 more households helped into a new-build home
About to be interviewed on @MarrShow about the budget this week and how we'll build a resilient economy
We've announced an increase in the Minimum Wage to £6.50 It's only because our economic plan is working that we can help #hardworking people
Heading back from ECOFIN in Brussels. Commitment to provide financial support to Ukrainian government through IMF and EU top of the agenda
Good night at Stamford Bridge with my son #CFC
During National Apprenticeship Week, why not use your #2Kcashback toward taking on an apprentice? #NAW2014
Just been meeting brilliant ambitious apprentices at event to celebrate apprenticeships programmes at No10 #NAW2014 http://t.co/9oqo3FuaBm
My letter to #smallbiz via @FSB_hq members today: ‘Thank you - you are the lifeblood of the economy’  : http://t.co/ayMXqSek2f #2kcashback
I’ve asked @HMRCgovuk to email half a million businesses today, telling them about the Employment Allowance #2kcashback
Businesses - we’ve got a calculator that breaks down how you’ll benefit from April’s Employment Allowance http://t.co/FEmsj8A7R8 #2kcashback
Delighted that LIBOR funds will support the first London Invictus Games, a new sporting event for injured service personnel #invictusgames
450,000 business will be taken out of paying employer National Insurance Contributions altogether in 2014/15, thanks to the #2kcashback
1.25m businesses & charities will benefit from the Employment Allowance from April #2kcashback http://t.co/nx6oUblj32
We are freezing assets across the EU on 18 Ukrainians suspected of misappropriating Ukrainian state funds
International Forum of Sovereign Wealth Funds announce London as their new home - clear vote of confidence in UK's long term economic plan
Delighted that International Finance Corporation has issued its first London Renminbi bond. Confirms UK's status as western RMB hub #China
Congrats to Steve McQueen for winning Best Picture & to visual effects @Framestore @Prime_Focus for winning with Gravity #Oscars
Hugely honoured to receive Politician of the Year award at the Asian Voice Awards - thank you very much http://t.co/4Youw66i4J
Popped in to event organised by brilliant @AmberRuddMP to support Local Shops in Hastings and Rye.
Just been opening refurbished Red Lion pub on Whitehall. As nearest local resident can confirm it looks great
Just been to British Chamber of Commerce meeting in Singapore. Good to hear they are providing more support to help British SMEs to export
Seen Singapore's PM and finance minister.Discussed doing more biz between our 2 nations so UK better connected to fast growing parts of Asia
Been at port in Singapore.Almost 50% UK exports to SE Asia pass through it including these LandRovers #MadeInBritain http://t.co/iyvJOIdG2o
Arrived in Singapore on way back from G20 for meetings with PM, finance minister and British businesses here tomorrow
PM put tax transparency on the agenda last year, #G20 now agreed next steps on new multinational firms' tax rules &personal tax info sharing
We’re taking global action to reform the tax system through G20 & at home with a tough approach to tackle #TaxAvoidance & #TaxEvasion
Just done an interview on Australia's morning show @Sunriseon7 about the G20 http://t.co/eFf8glFm5P
Been speaking to the Sydney Institute about the G20. My message is that we all need to get our houses in order to improve global resilience
Have arrived in Sydney for the G20 finance ministers' meeting. Just had good bilat with the Australian finance minister @JoeHockey
Just been at MTR high speed rail terminus where British expertise in infrastructure is leading to contracts for UK firms here in Hong Kong
You can read my full Hong Kong speech here https://t.co/LTb2itYtJO
Will support exports so that wherever you are in the world you can't help but see Made in Britain.
Been speaking to business leaders in Hong Kong about redoubling our efforts to increase exports & investment. An important part of budget
In Hong Kong will make speech about our relationship with China & what we all need to do at the G20 to prevent a new international crisis
Another welcome fall in unemployment today. Each new job means economic security for another family #LongTermEconomicPlan
Just arrived in Hong Kong for meetings and speech tomorrow before heading to Sydney for G20 later this week
Inflation falling to 1.9% - its lowest level in over 4 years - is good news for #hardworking families & means more economic security
Government is providing a tax exemption for Glasgow Grand Prix. Supporting @Glasgow2014 in bringing top athletes to Scotland this summer
Nice cup of tea at Catherine's On The Crescent in Morecambe - will benefit from the £2000 employment allowance http://t.co/n60bX4PNZt
Been visiting local businesses in Morecambe with local @MPDavidMorris. Pleased to hear many saying business confidence growing
As @LondonFashionWk begins, wish everyone involved in this growing industry best of luck. Great opp to showcase our world class talent #LFW
In Carlisle speaking to business leaders & local residents about our long term economic plan and how we're supporting small businesses here
Buying local produce @Cranstons1 food hall @OrtonGrange with @RoryStewartUK. And great to have tea with apprentices http://t.co/f3AxacnehP
In Carlisle to see BSW Timber with @JohnStevensonMP. A firm which today announced 60 new jobs. That's economic security for more families
Just been to the Garden of Remembrance for the victims of the Lockerbie air disaster to pay my respects with local MP @DavidMundellMP
In Lockerbie to visit PPML, a successful biz which exports around the world & says independence would be a disaster for jobs & business here

You can read my full speech here 
https://t.co/OWldIdjIp2 and the Treasury advice here 
https://t.co/wZkVIlVLiN
Those who say that an independent Scotland will share the £ need to know: that is not going to happen #indyref
I couldn't recommend a currency union with a separate Scotland; I don't think any other Chancellor could either.  #indyref
I want Scotland to stay in UK & keep economic security of the pound. But currency union after independence simply wouldn't work #indyref
Passionately hope Scotland stays in our family of nations: I'll be saying more about why shortly #indyref
In Edinburgh this morning to talk about Scotland, the UK & what independence would mean for the pound.
On @agendaitv programme being interviewed by @tombradby talking about the economy and trying to keep fit!
Unusual lunch. Just interviewed Andrew Marr at Turn the Tables for @CR_UK. Was fun but think his job is safe.. http://t.co/jW93cBvhwV
I'm at the @Google roadshow in Tatton helping make sure that children in our schools learn to create new technology, not just use it #coding
Northern Hub upgrade will benefit whole region & create 1000s new jobs. This is the economic security our long term plan will provide
At #Manchester Airport station for start of £600m Northern Hub rail upgrade, key part of our National Infrastructure Plan
Enjoyed meeting businesses in Halifax and Keighley today. If you are a #smallbiz make sure you're ready to claim your #2kcashback
Now in Howarth for cup of tea at lovely @cobbles_clay. Worth a visit - they’ll benefit from the #2kcashback too http://t.co/woREXcGK6Y
With local MP @khopkinsmp at Advanced Actuators in Silsden - growing manufacturing company exporting, creating jobs & economic security
Lovely lunch @Yorkshiregrub pub – great local in Addingham where have also just done an interview with @JamesReedYP @yorkshirepost
Taking questions @deanclough in Halifax. Explaining how the #2kcashback will work to support #smallbiz and jobs http://t.co/Dt9zuri8YM
RT @hmtreasury: Want to find out how @cookdeanclough are putting their #2kcashback to work? Ruth Robinson explains in 30 secs http://t.co/F…
Finding out how @cookdeanclough in Halifax will spend their #2kcashback - & getting a cooking lesson while I'm here http://t.co/ehexxML5Tg
Looking forward to visiting lots of #smallbiz in West Yorkshire. Will be asking how they'll spend their #2kcashback http://t.co/RrfWvbdxre
From April 1.25m businesses & charities will be entitled to a #2kcashback on jobs.Here's everything you need to know http://t.co/cuZt7Mk8lP
Signed Time to Change pledge re tackling mental health stigma at work. Thanks @campbellclaret for speaking at event http://t.co/0i1Fk823uK
In the 21st century the ability to #code and program a computer is no longer a nice-to-have, it’s an essential
Been with Michael Gove to help launch #YearofCode - backing tech & making sure our children are equipped with the skills of the future
Showdown in Downing St http://t.co/4zcVhd0mjf
Best wishes to all at Chinese New Year. Chance to celebrate our success in building closer UK-China economic ties http://t.co/Yb3ScogXBK
Good news that @Disney chooses UK to film Alice in Wonderland sequel. Good for jobs and investment in Britain
Today stats from @BFI show 14% rise in UK film production spend -shows our tax breaks working & supporting more jobs in this growing sector
Amazing technology being used @ImaginariumUK- showing Britain really does have the best creative industries
This evening visiting @EalingStudios & @ImaginariumUK with local MP @AngieBrayMP to celebrate success of our creative industries
Science is one of the fastest growing sectors for job creation. Backing science is one of ways we will secure a balanced recovery for all
Just been in Oxford with excellent local MP @nicolablackwood to announce £30m government investment in science as part of Oxford City Deal
Growth is broadly based with manufacturing growing fastest. The job is not done & the biggest risk to recovery would be abandoning the plan
0.7% growth in GDP is a boost for the economic security of #hardworking people. Our long term plan is delivering a brighter economic future
Dec borrowing £2 billion less than year ago. Our plan is working. Lower government borrowing means greater economic security for families
Biggest rise in employment in UK's history. Our plan is working. Each new job means another family more secure
Strong manufacturing figures from @CBItweets. More evidence of a balanced recovery delivering economic security
Been meeting with entrepreneurs from @Zopa, @LoveHouseSwap, @Zipcar and other other exciting firms to show support for this new industry
Great workshop in Downing St on the sharing economy which is disrupting traditional business models & giving consumers more choice
Because our long term economic plan is working Britain can afford a real rise in the minimum wage to secure a recovery for all
Great to see @barclaysuknews offering #HelptoBuy mortgages, this will give even more choice to #hardworking people who are house hunting
Been interviewed by @bbcnickrobinson about our economic plan & what we're doing to support #hardworking people http://t.co/hgb6qSp5P0
With Tony & Rebecca who took over Nuneaton's White Stone Pub 2 years ago after winning Come Dine With Me.Great food! http://t.co/cNmDStAUYg
With @MarcusJonesMP talking to businesses in Nuneaton - about our long term economic plan & what more we can do here to back jobs
Speaking to engineers and apprentices at Coventry's High Value Manufacturing centre http://t.co/vILDGSjlGs
Seen cutting edge technology here @the_MTC_org - including one of the world's most powerful lasers
Aerospace is worth £24 billion a year to the UK economy and growing #global race
Am at the manufacturing technology centre in Coventry to announce £60 million for UK aerospace development
Spoke to @OpenEurope today. My message is: #EU must reform or decline. The full speech is here http://t.co/13so2BCGDt
Inflation's at 2%- that's back to target for first time in 4 years. Another sign our long term economic plan working for #hardworking people
Bank of China's UK branch issued its 1st UK Renminbi bond today - single largest RMB bond issued out of London. Good for UK jobs & business
Popped in to lovely @ChiffChaffCafe with Bedford MP Richard Fuller.  April's Employment Allowance will help them take on another employee
At Ridgeway garage with @nickdebois MP.The £2000 cashback on jobs means they can buy new equipment & will be taking on extra member of staff
In Enfield to launch countdown to April's Employment Allowance. Will give businesses £2000 off their jobs tax to support employment
Good to see @santanderk launch new #HelptoBuy products today. This gives even more choice to consumers house hunting in the New Year
Good manufacturing news: British Chamber of Commerce say confidence & employment at all time high. We must build on this
Good that UK's Ashmore to become 1st western company allowed to invest directly in Chinese domestic equity and bond markets #Global race
If you'd like to read my speech in full you can find it here https://t.co/aMCrDRU531
We have a plan to back #hardworking people. It means facing up to hard truths - including more cuts required so we live within our means
Made argument that UK faces choice-let up now with more borrowing & back to square one or work through our plan to deliver a secure future
I spoke to employees about the choice facing Britain in 2014 http://t.co/uHgblsgIPI
Been speaking at Sertec - great manufacturing business in Coleshill, Warwickshire which today announced it's creating 400 jobs.
Will be on @bbcwm at 0805 before heading to nearby manufacturing company where I'll talk to employees about our long term economic plan
About to be interviewed on @BBCr4today. Will talk about our long term economic plan & the choice for Britain in 2014
Good news that many #hardworking people are in their new homes for the New Year thanks to the #HelptoBuy mortgage guarantee scheme
